content: Of course, these small betrayals won’t deter Trump’s idolators. The delicious simplicity of the conflicts both Trump and his sympathizers concoct are too precious to jeopardize with small changes in evidence. Both books come accompanied by dramatic and hyperbolic subtitles—Trump’s Plan to Save America, His Battle for America—implicating their authors in the role of holy crusader. What is one slip-up (or dozens) from your ally when the enemies you face are ruining the country in some insidious though unspecified way?
